title: Is Aspartame Responsible for ‘An Epidemic of Multiple Sclerosis and Lupus’?
subtitle: Reports of the ingestion of aspartame in patients who later have suffered multiple sclerosis or systemic lupus is obviously not scientifically sustainable evidence.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: The artificial sweetener aspartame is responsible for an epidemic of cancer, brain tumors, and multiple sclerosis.
